title: Affirm / BNPL User Portal
description: Developed customer self-service tools, resulting in 25K reduction in inbound contacts and $0.66M decrease in servicing costs. Built phone number change flow, leading to $58.84M in annualized GMV and a 16.6% increase in conversion rate. Implemented self-service billing address update feature, resulting in $360K annualized contribution margin. Led frontend implementation of dispute deferral feature, improving customer satisfaction and reducing operational costs. Improved unit/integration test coverage to over 80%.
responsibilities: Developed customer self-service tools, resulting in 25K reduction in inbound contacts and $0.66M decrease in servicing costs.
Built phone number change flow, leading to $58.84M in annualized GMV and a 16.6% increase in conversion rate.
Implemented self-service billing address update feature, resulting in $360K annualized contribution margin.
Led frontend implementation of dispute deferral feature, improving customer satisfaction and reducing operational costs.
Improved unit/integration test coverage to over 80%.
technologies: React, TypeScript, Python, CSS Modules, Jest

title: Care.com / Childcare Booking App
description: Enhanced React micro-frontends architecture and NodeJS GraphQL server in a team. Improved booking flow and scheduling functionality for caregivers and clients.
responsibilities: Enhanced React micro-frontends architecture and NodeJS GraphQL server in a team of 5.
Improved booking flow and scheduling functionality for caregivers and clients.
technologies: React, TypeScript, NextJS, Styled Components, GraphQL, Jest

title: Credit Union / Car Loan Calculator
description: Introduced atomic design methodology and established Redux architecture patterns. Led implementation of key UI components and mentored junior developers.
responsibilities: Introduced atomic design methodology and established Redux architecture patterns.
Led implementation of key UI components and mentored junior developers.
technologies: React, Redux, TypeScript, Styled Components, OpenAPI, Jest

title: Sizmek (RocketFuel) / Ad DSP Portal
description: Developed frontend functionality using React and Redux for ad campaign management. Improved developer onboarding process using Docker, reducing setup time. Implemented continuous integration using Jenkins.
responsibilities: Developed frontend functionality using React and Redux for ad campaign management.
Improved developer onboarding process using Docker, reducing setup time from days to hours.
Implemented continuous integration using Jenkins.
technologies: JavaScript, React, Redux, Node.js, Docker, Jenkins, Jest

title: UCMDB DDM Content
description: Developed modules for an enterprise IT infrastructure dependency mapping system, discovering more configuration items for customers.
responsibilities: Developed modules for an enterprise IT infrastructure dependency mapping system
Discovered more configuration items for customers
Developed different modules allowing to discover more configuration items for customer (IPv6, Red Hat, SAP, Windows 2012)
Investigated an issue and proposed a solution that streamlines developer experience (python module reloading mechanism)
Implemented a script that reports configuration items the product supports to reduce manual collection and to help sales to advertise the product to customers

title: Office Plugins for Embedded Browser
description: PDF, DOC, XLS, PPT NPAPI-plugins, EWS library.
responsibilities: Implemented a core part of PDF-viewing plugin that is used to view PDF-documents in the car infotainment system
Improved appearance and quality of Office document viewing plugins
Improved quality of Exchange Web Services library that is used in the product that delivers MS e-mail services into the car infotainment system
Introduced Hudson/Jenkins CI to the team to improve quality and better detect bugs

title: Rotor Balancing Machine
description: Embedded software for rotor balancing machine.
responsibilities: Developed Software Requirements Specification document to better understand customer needs
Implemented a complete system that controls a dynamic balancing machine that is used to rebalance rotors
technologies: AVR Assembler, C++, Qt, Sqlite, Linux
